headline: Energy Transition Today - Floating Solar: Harnessing Water for Enhanced Energy Output
summary: Noria Energy has initiated construction of Aurea Solar, a 50 kW floating solar pilot project in Golden, Colorado, utilizing their innovative AquaPhi® tracking technology. This project is significant in the energy transition landscape as it demonstrates a novel application of floating solar with tracking capabilities, which can enhance energy output by 10-20% compared to conventional static systems. Located on Fairmount Reservoir, the project exemplifies how existing water infrastructure can...

headline: Drones transforming operations in the oil and gas sector
summary: The global drone market is forecast to surge from $32.2bn in 2024 to nearly $90bn by 2030.
